volcanism.sentence_en: ' Volcanism is important because it represents the pulse of the planets , ' he added .

mutter.meaning: vi.咕哝；喃喃自语 vt.咕哝；抱怨地说；低声含糊地说 n.咕哝；喃喃低语 n.(Mutter)人名；(法)米泰；(德、匈、西)穆特；(英)马特
mutter.sentence_en: I mutter , as they find their seats near us .
mutter.sentence_cn: 我咕哝道，因为他们座位离我们很近。

volume.meaning: n.量；体积；卷；音量；大量；册 adj.大量的 vi.成团卷起 vt.把…收集成卷
volume.sentence_en: We then attach each volume group to its primary server .
volume.sentence_cn: 然后，我们将每个卷组挂到了其主服务器上。

contradictory.meaning: adj.矛盾的；反对的；反驳的；抗辩的 n.对立物；矛盾因素
contradictory.sentence_en: As contradictory as this sounds , I have firsthand experience of its truth .
contradictory.sentence_cn: 这听起来似乎矛盾，不过我有亲身体验，证明它的真实。

squeeze.meaning: vt.挤；紧握；勒索 vi.压榨 n.压榨；紧握；拥挤；佣金
squeeze.sentence_en: Some are well placed to benefit from a prospective squeeze on space .
squeeze.sentence_cn: 一些开发商已经准备好从预期的拥挤空间中受益。

instructive.sentence_en: In this regard , comparisons of the virus with strains from previous outbreaks may be instructive .
instructive.sentence_cn: 在这方面，将该病毒与来自以往暴发的毒株进行比较可能是有益的。

insipid.sentence_en: Ornament is not in itself bad, only when it 's camouflage on insipid form .
insipid.sentence_cn: 装饰本身不是问题，问题是它虚伪、平淡的形式用来掩盖乏味平淡的结构。

recede.sentence_en: As the many paths recede , Michigan ’s Upper Peninsula loses its appeal , and the only hope of crossing the West Coast requires a weekend trip to Salt Lake City .
recede.sentence_cn: 由于许多道路退去，密歇根州半岛失去其吸引力，穿越美国西海岸唯一的希望，需要一周才能前往盐湖城。

distract.sentence_en: Several people talking at once distract a listener .
distract.sentence_cn: 几个人同时讲话会使听者分散注意力。

retool.meaning: vt.重组；重新装备 vi.更换工具；重新装备；更换机械设备

record.meaning: vt.记录，记载；标明；将...录音 vi.记录；录音 n.档案，履历；唱片；最高纪录 adj.创纪录的 n.(Record)人名；(法)勒科尔；(英)雷科德
record.sentence_en: I'm giving you this information for the record .
record.sentence_cn: 我向你提供这个情报，以供记录在案。

below.meaning: adv.在下面，在较低处；在本页下面 prep.在…下面 n.(Below)人名；(英、德、芬、瑞典)贝洛
below.sentence_en: He had a bruise just below his right eye .
below.sentence_cn: 就在他的右眼下面有一块伤痕。

graphite.meaning: n.石墨；黑铅 vt.用石墨涂
graphite.sentence_en: The graphite is mixed with clay from Mississippi in which ammonium hydroxide is used in the refining process .
graphite.sentence_cn: 石墨要与产自密西西比河床的粘土混合，在精炼过程中，还要用到氢氧化铵。

fertilize.sentence_en: Water it, fertilize it, rake it, trim it carefully ; pull some weeds .
fertilize.sentence_cn: 浇水、施肥、耕地、仔细修剪，还需要去除一些杂草。

demonstrate.meaning: vt.证明；展示；论证 vi.示威
demonstrate.sentence_en: How can I demonstrate to you that my story is true ?
demonstrate.sentence_cn: 我怎么才能向你证明我的话是真的呢?

broadly.meaning: adv.明显地；宽广地；概括地；露骨地；粗鄙地
broadly.sentence_en: The term tool in conjunction with some applications seems rather mutually exclusive unless you broadly associate tools for entertainment into your definition .
broadly.sentence_cn: 工具这个词连同有些应用似乎有些互斥，除非你在定义中把工具和娱乐大致关联到一起。

meaningless.sentence_en: The meaningless abstraction bespattered political and theoretical books .
meaningless.sentence_cn: 那些毫无意义的抽象语言有损于政治理论书籍的价值。

maroon.meaning: n.栗色；逃亡黑人奴隶；孤立的人 v.使孤立；放逐到无人岛上 adj.栗色的
maroon.sentence_en: I wore a maroon velvet trouser suit that my daughter chose , and most of the village came to the reception .
maroon.sentence_cn: 那天，我穿了女儿为我挑选的栗色天鹅绒裤装，村庄里的大多数人都应邀参加了我的婚礼。

goodness.meaning: int.天哪 n.善良，优秀；精华，养分
goodness.sentence_en: Beauty will fade , but not goodness .
goodness.sentence_cn: 美貌会凋谢，但美德不会。

theatre.meaning: n.电影院，戏院；戏剧；阶梯式讲堂
theatre.sentence_en: The audience laughed the performer out of the theatre .
theatre.sentence_cn: 观众用哄笑把那个表演者赶出了剧场。

subtropical.sentence_en: Ornstein says subtropical regions , such as the Sahara and the Australian outback , do not have this problem .
subtropical.sentence_cn: 奥恩斯坦说，亚热带地区，如撒哈拉沙漠和澳大利亚内陆，却没有这个问题。

narrator.sentence_en: “What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas, but what happens in California makes the world go round,” says a narrator .
narrator.sentence_cn: 一个解说员说道：“维加斯发生的事就在维加斯，但是加州发生了什么全世界都知道了。”

permeability.meaning: n.渗透性；透磁率，导磁系数；弥漫
permeability.sentence_en: The most interesting dimension of this is what Google Search Appliance says about the increasing permeability of a company and the outside world .
permeability.sentence_cn: 其中，最有趣的一点是谷歌搜索设备所反映的“公司和外部世界日益增加的渗透性”。

squirrel.meaning: n.松鼠；松鼠毛皮 vt.贮藏
squirrel.sentence_en: It was moving fast like a squirrel , but it was as loud as a bear .
squirrel.sentence_cn: 它像松鼠一样快速的移动但那声音却像是熊发出的似的。

immobilize.meaning: vt.使固定；使不动；使停止流通
immobilize.sentence_en: It has been a metaphor for me in my adult years . Why wait to dance ? Why let fear immobilize me ? Why not act on intention , on desire ?
immobilize.sentence_cn: 在我成人以后，这一直都是我的一个隐喻。为什么跳舞前要等呢？为什么畏惧使我无法移动？为什么不依照意愿和愿望而行动？

diplomat.meaning: n.外交家，外交官；有外交手腕的人；处事圆滑机敏的人
diplomat.sentence_en: He started his official career as a diplomat .
diplomat.sentence_cn: 他从当外交官起开始了他的从政生涯。

incredible.sentence_cn: 乍一听来，简直不可思议。

percent.meaning: n.百分比，百分率；部分；百分数 adj.百分之…的 adv.以百分之…地
percent.sentence_en: At the end of the day , add up the percent DVs .
percent.sentence_cn: 在一天结束后，把所有营养素的百分比加起来。

book.meaning: n.书籍；卷；帐簿；名册；工作簿 vt.预订；登记 n.(Book)人名；(中)卜(广东话·威妥玛)；(朝)北；(英)布克；(瑞典)博克
book.sentence_cn: 我们喜欢用圆珠笔写书。

gannet.sentence_en: Rescue workers carefully clean an oil- soaked northern gannet bird at a facility in Fort Jackson , Louisiana .
gannet.sentence_cn: 救援人员在路易斯安娜州杰克逊堡（FortJackson）的一处救援场所仔细地清理一只浸透了油污的北塘鹅。

boon.meaning: n.恩惠；福利；利益 adj.愉快的；慷慨的 n.(Boon)人名；(英)布恩；(东南亚国家华语)文；(瑞典、德)博恩；(泰)汶
boon.sentence_en: This great boon of freedom which he allowed me , none else would have dared to do ; many even blamed him for it.
boon.sentence_cn: 这是他给予我的莫大自由的恩惠，没有别人敢于去做，许多人为此还责怪过他。

repute.meaning: n.名誉；声望 vt.名誉；认为；把…称为
repute.sentence_en: In the past , red dyes were expensive , so red walls and fabrics suggested luxurious wealth , importance or ill repute .
repute.sentence_cn: 过去，红色染料都很昂贵，因此，红色的墙和织物意味着奢华、财富、重要性和坏名声。

pantomime.meaning: n.哑剧；舞剧；手势 vi.打手势；演哑剧 vt.打手势；演哑剧
pantomime.sentence_en: Whenever the question of bailouts is mentioned , Merkel acts out a pantomime of reluctance to dish out more cash .
pantomime.sentence_cn: 任何时候提到紧急救援问题，默克尔表现的都像哑剧演员一样不情愿掷出更多的钱。

junk.meaning: n.垃圾，废物；舢板 n.(Junk)人名；(德、捷)容克
junk.sentence_en: Raise you hands if you like junk food .
junk.sentence_cn: 提高你的手如果你喜欢垃圾食品。

nourishment.sentence_en: Because we do not rest ,we lost our way .We lose the nourishment that gives us succor.
nourishment.sentence_cn: 因为我们从不休息，以致迷失了方向。失去了为我们补充能量的营养。

frustrate.meaning: vt.挫败；阻挠；使感到灰心 vi.失败；受挫 adj.挫败的；无益的
frustrate.sentence_en: They made their preparations to frustrate the conspiracy .
frustrate.sentence_cn: 他们作好准备挫败这个阴谋。

squeak.meaning: vi.告密；吱吱叫；侥幸成功 n.吱吱声；机会 vt.以短促尖声发出
squeak.sentence_en: With a third group , she activated the squeak as if by accident .
squeak.sentence_cn: 对于第三组，她则假装吱吱声是偶然发生的。

cliff.meaning: n.悬崖；绝壁 n.(Cliff)人名；(英)克利夫
cliff.sentence_en: He was hounded to the cliff .
cliff.sentence_cn: 他被追逼到了悬崖边上。

extort.meaning: vt.敲诈；侵占；强求；牵强地引出
extort.sentence_en: But I don't see how North Korea can use it to extort anything .
extort.sentence_cn: 但是我不相信朝鲜可以用它来敲诈任何东西。

auxiliary.meaning: n.助动词；辅助者，辅助物；附属机构 adj.辅助的；副的；附加的
auxiliary.sentence_en: The primary constructor in a derived class must invoke one of the parent class constructors , either the primary constructor or an auxiliary constructor .
auxiliary.sentence_cn: 子类的主构造函数必须调用父类的一个构造函数，无论是主构造函数或者是辅助构造函数。

fund.meaning: n.基金；资金；存款 vt.投资；资助 n.(Fund)人名；(德)丰德
fund.sentence_en: They clubbed a fund of money for poor children .
fund.sentence_cn: 他们为贫穷的孩子们募集了一笔资金。

necrosis.sentence_en: Milestones like new brain tumors , necrosis , the end of treatments , and hospice.
necrosis.sentence_cn: 晚期就意味着新的脑瘤，坏疽，治疗的结束，还有护理所。

balsa.meaning: n.一种轻质木材 n.(Balsa)人名；(西、葡)巴尔萨
balsa.sentence_en: hammer and nail ( optional - if you are using soft balsa or craft wood these are not necessary )
balsa.sentence_cn: 锤子和钉子（可选——如果你用的木头比较软的话，就不需要了）

flatfish.sentence_en: Recently , she caught a large catfish with the flatfish lures when going on vacation in Ebro River in Spain . The catfish was 97 .85 kilograms weight .
flatfish.sentence_cn: 日前她在西班牙巴塞罗纳附近的埃布罗河度假时，用大比目鱼鱼饵，逮到一条体重达97.85公斤的淡水鲶鱼。

xenon.sentence_en: Xenon and krypton are not retained by the body so they have little effect .
xenon.sentence_cn: 氙和氪不能在人体内停留所以对人体影响很小。

sash.meaning: n.腰带；肩带；饰带；框格 vt.系上腰带；装以窗框
sash.sentence_en: One point we find curious in this photo from 1879 is the sash tied around the outside of the girl 's arms .
sash.sentence_cn: 看上去很重哦！我们在这张1879年的照片里看到有趣的一点，腰带在女孩的胳膊上缠了一圈。

jawbone.meaning: n.颚骨；信用；下颚骨 vt.赊买 vi.赊买
jawbone.sentence_en: And even without the genetic revelations , the jawbone itself gives a few hints about the individual .
jawbone.sentence_cn: 就算没有这个遗传启示，这个颚骨本身对这个个体的情况也提示的甚少。
